trait.name: Rampage
text: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hp with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The gnoll makes three attacks. one with its bite and two with its whip or three with its longbow.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Whip
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Menace Captives (Recharge 56)
text: The gnoll selects up to three creatures it has taken captive within 30 feet. Each creature must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage for 1 minute on any attack rolls or skill checks to take actions other than those the gnoll has ordered it to take.
